title: SafeClaw — AI Tool Review
description: SafeClaw replicates OpenClaw core functionality without prompt injection vulnerabilities — a minimal, safer autonomous AI assistant. SafeClaw is an open-source project providing OpenClaw's core features while eliminating prompt injection vulnerabilities and reducing attack scope. Designed for security-conscious users who want a simpler, safer autonomous AI assistant. Highlights: Minimal attack surface. Prompt injection protection. Simpler codebase to audit. Free and open-source.
